===Overview===
The Weird Happenings Organisation is a British Military organisation set up by the twins Alistaire and Alysande Stuart. W.H.O’s mission is to investigate people, places, things, and events that occured outside the normal realms of possibility, and to deal with them if needed.{{r|Excalibur Vol 1 6}}

===History===
It has assisted Excalibur and other British superheroes on numerous occasions.{{r|Excalibur Vol 1 #6|56}} After Brigadier Alysande Stuart was murdered, it was incorporated into [[Resources Control Executive (Earth-616)|R.C.X.]]{{r|Excalibur Vol 1 #62}}
| Equipment               = Various military equipment
| Transportation          = [[W.H.O. Helicarrier]]{{r|Excalibur Air Apparent Vol 1 #1}}
| Weapons                 = Various conventional weapons
| Notes                   = The Weird Happenings Organization. This is an organization that spied on [[Excalibur (Earth-616)|Excalibur]].
| Trivia                  = W.H.O is a reference to U.N.I.T, a similar organisation in the television program Doctor Who.
